com.gf.extra.scan
Interface ClassScanner

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultClassScanner, ReflectionsScanner
public interface ClassScanner

Interface for package scanning. Used for Engine.scanAndPut(String) logic.
There are two default implementations:

  • DefaultClassScanner: for standalone app, Tomcat Web Server
  • ReflectionsScanner: for JBoss AS
You can use own scanner type by setting it to engine with config key ClassScannerKey: 
 Engine engine = new Engine();
 engine.setConfig(ClassScannerKey.class, YourScannerType.class);
 engine.scanPackageForAnnotations("some.package");

Author:
Evgeny Dolganov
See Also:
ClassScannerKey

Parameters:

Returns:
set of children classes or null
